mapper.select: SELECT blog_id as blogId, writer, blog_title as blogTitle, blog_content as blogContent, published_at as publishedAt, updated_at as updatedAt, blog_count as blogCount FROM blog ORDER BY blog_id DESC

SELECT blog_id as blogId, writer, blog_title as blogTitle, blog_content as blogContent, published_at as publishedAt, updated_at as updatedAt, blog_count as blogCount FROM blog WHERE blog_id = #{blogId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog (writer, blog_title, blog_content) VALUES (#{writer}, #{blogTitle}, #{blogContent})
mapper.update: UPDATE blog SET blog_title = #{blogTitle}, blog_content = #{blogContent}, updated_at = now() WHERE blog_id = #{blogId}

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS blog( blog_id int auto_increment primary key, writer varchar(16) not null, blog_title varchar(200) not null, blog_content varchar(4000) not null, published_at datetime default now(), updated_at datetime default now(), blog_count int default 0 )
